title: Identifying Reciprocals
text: Notice the second and third terms are reciprocals: $$0.2=\frac{2}{10}=\frac{1}{5}$$ which is a reciprocal of $$5$$ thus they cancel out to $$1$$ when multiplied.

title: Simplifying the Expression
text: Multiply the resulting expression from left to right. What is the simplified expression?
